ref.full: Oliveira, M. B.; Dominguez-Peirez, M.; Freire, M. G.; Llovell, F.; Cabeza, O.; Lopes-Da-Silva, J. A.; Vega, L. F.; Coutinho, J. A. P. (2012) J. Phys. Chem. B 116, 12133-12141.
ref.title: Surface Tension of Binary Mixtures of 1.Alkyl-3-methylimidazolium Bis(trifluoromethylsulfonyl)imide Ionic Liquids: Experimental Measurements and Soft-SAFT Modeling
